Modules

 Bullet Physics Library

Detailed Description

External libraries

As with Internal libraries these libraries are provided in the Blender codebase. This is to make building Blender easier. The main development of these libraries is not part of the normal Blender development process, but each of the library is developed separately. Whenever deemed necessary libraries in extern/ folder are updated.
